## Libraries

<hr>

```{r libs, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(mbar)

library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Preprocessing

<hr>

```{r mba_preprocess, fig.align='center', out.width="100%", echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("img/mba_pre_process.png")
```

## Preprocessing

<hr>

```{r preprocess, eval=FALSE}
mba_data     <- read_excel("online-retail.xlsx")
transactions <- mbar_prep_data(mba_data, InvoiceNo, Description)
head(transactions)
```

## What time of day do people purchase?

<hr>

<br>

```{r eda_1, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center', fig.height=5, eval=FALSE}
purchase_time <-
  mba_data %>%
  group_by(InvoiceDate) %>%
  slice(1) %>%
  mutate(time_of_day = hour(InvoiceDate)) %>%
  pull(time_of_day) %>%
  as.factor() %>%
  fct_count()

purchase_time %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(x = f, y = n), fill = "blue") +
  xlab("Hour of Day") + ylab("Transactions") +
  ggtitle("Hourly Transaction Distribution")  
```

## How many items are purchased on an average?

<hr>

```{r eda_2, eval=FALSE}
items <- 
  mba_data %>%
  group_by(InvoiceNo) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  pull(count) 

mean(items)
median(items)
```

## Most Purchased Items

<hr>

```{r eda_4, eval=FALSE}
mba_data %>%
  group_by(Description) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(count))
```

## Average Order Value

<hr>

```{r eda_5, eval=FALSE}
total_revenue <- 
  mba_data %>%
  group_by(InvoiceNo) %>%
  summarize(order_sum = sum(UnitPrice)) %>%
  pull(order_sum) %>%
  sum()

total_transactions <- 
  mba_data %>%
  group_by(InvoiceNo) %>%
  summarize(n()) %>%
  nrow()

total_revenue / total_transactions
```

## Read Data

<hr>

```{r read_data, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
basket_data <- read.transactions("transaction_data.csv", format = "basket", 
  sep = ",")
basket_data
```

## Summary

<hr>

```{r summary, eval=FALSE}
summary(basket_data)
```

## Item Frequency Plot

<hr>

```{r plot_freq, fig.align='center', fig.height=5, eval=FALSE}
itemFrequencyPlot(basket_data, topN = 10, type = 'absolute')
```

## Generate Rules

<hr>

```{r rules_generate, eval=FALSE}
rules <- apriori(basket_data, parameter = list(supp=0.009, conf=0.8, 
	target = "rules", maxlen = 4))
```

## Rules Summary

<hr>

```{r rules_summary, eval=FALSE}
summary(rules)
```

## Inspect Rules

<hr>

```{r rules_inspect, eval=FALSE}
basket_rules <- sort(rules, by = 'confidence', decreasing = TRUE)
inspect(basket_rules[1:10])
```

<hr>

## Redundant Rules

<hr>

```{r rules_redundant, eval=FALSE}
rules_redundant <-
  basket_rules %>%
  is.subset(rules) %>%
  colSums() %>%
  is_greater_than(1) %>%
  which()
```

## Redundant Rules

<hr>

```{r rules_redundant_print, eval=FALSE}
rules_redundant
```

## Remove Redundant Rules

<hr>

```{r rules_unique, eval=FALSE}
rules_pruned <- basket_rules[-rules_redundant]
inspect(rules_pruned)
```


## What influenced purchase of product X?

<hr>

```{r rhs, eval=FALSE}
sugar_rules <- apriori(basket_data, parameter = list(supp = 0.009, conf = 0.8), 
  appearance = list(default = "lhs", rhs = "SUGAR"), 
  control = list(verbose = F)) 
rules_sugar <- sort(sugar_rules, by = "confidence", decreasing = TRUE)
inspect(rules_sugar)
```

## What purchases did product X influence?

<hr>

```{r lhs, eval=FALSE}
sugar_rules <- apriori(basket_data, parameter = list(supp = 0.009, conf = 0.8), 
  appearance = list(default = "rhs", lhs = "SUGAR"), 
  control = list(verbose = F)) 
rules_sugar <- sort(sugar_rules, by = "confidence", decreasing = TRUE)
inspect(rules_sugar)
```

## Top Rules

<hr>

```{r top_rules, eval=FALSE}
top_rules <- basket_rules[1:10]
inspect(top_rules)
```

## {data-background="img/ws_section_summary.png"}

## Summary

<hr>

- unsupervised data mining technique
- uncovers products frequently bought together
- creates if-then scenario rules
- cost-effective, insightful and actionable
- association rule mining has applications in several industries
- directionality of rule is lost while using lift
- confidence as a measure can be misleading
